moves.1. e4: Hello everybody...This is a game that i played with a mate from Australia!!! This was our third game and i won the previous two... Well his rating is around 950 and mine is around 1420...But a huge mistake of mine showed that he's gonna win... Well i started with e4.
moves.2... b6: Well he played b6 which was quite worthless i think.
moves.3. Nxe5: So i took his e5 pawn.
moves.3... f6: f6 was not the greatest defence..
moves.4... Nh6: He opened his knight in a awkard square instead of doing something different to develop his pieces in better squares.
moves.5. Bc4: I played typical with my bishop..
moves.5... c6: c6 he played. I think Bc5 would be better...
moves.6. d4: So i tried to take the space in the centre..
moves.6... Ba6: He wanted to exchange our bishops...
moves.7... Nxa6: And he took mine..Still he's quite back in development.
moves.8. Nc3: I opened the other knight as well.
moves.8... f5: f5 is quite risky i think.
moves.9. e5: But i replied with e5 instead of taking the pawn.
moves.11. Qd3: i was opening my Queen for some more pressure. Now i wonder if 0-0 would be better..
moves.12. bxc3: I prefer to take it with my pawn instead of taking it with my Queen in order to take his knight somehow..haha
moves.13... Nb4: And he played his knight nicely.. Now i've made a really bad bad movement...I didn't think so much so i was completely trapped!!!
moves.14. Qa3: Qa3?? So bad for me...I still wonder how i managed to do that!
moves.14... Nxc2+: Nxc2+!!.. Great, so good! I felt so desperate and loser! Nothing to do!!!
moves.15. Kd2: I just played with king though everything seemed tragic!
moves.15... Nxa3: Well done mate!!! The only thing that i had in mind was attacking somehow!!! I had to play aggresive though i knew i was lost!
moves.16. Rae1: So i had a plan or somekind of plan to attack to his king! But he could easily defend i suppose!
moves.17... bxc4: And he took the pawn in order to push me more later!
moves.18... c3: He pushed his pawn further! i think 0-0 would be better for him!
moves.19... Kxd7: He took the pawn! Now i wanted checked him continiously in order to win something!
moves.20. Re7+: Again check. i wanted the second roock out as well!
moves.20... Kd6: He replied badly for me! Better would be Kc8 i think.
moves.21. Rhe1: The second rook is coming out!
moves.22... Rab8: Nice movement that he didn't actually take advantage of.
moves.23. Re1e6+: Now my plan was starting to become reality though i still had a lot to do! So check!
moves.24. Re6e5+: Again check. Nice movement i think!
moves.24... Kc4: He just replied.. Now i somehow had the chance to equalize...Still he could win the game easily and i could lost 19.5 points!!!! Oh God!! haha
moves.25. Rxa5: Somehow my plan became truth! But the game was at his hands!
moves.25... Kc3: I think with that movement lost the game!!! i mean Rb1 would be a thousand times better!!! And also i still don't why he hasn't protected his knight!!! Until that moment he had the control of this game but now i won't let him win!
moves.26. Rxa3+: Of course i take advantage of his previous mistake!
moves.26... Kc4: And still he should have replied better. I mean K b3 would be better. Now he killed his game and destroyed everything as his pawn was lost..
moves.27... Rb4: He might try a rook compination.
moves.28. Rc3+: I checked him again...I felt so relieved that i change the game upside down. With some blunders black lost an easy winning game and 19.5 points.
moves.28... Kb5 29. Rc5+: I was trying to checkmated him though it would take sometime!
moves.30... a5: a5 for protection! now i need the compination of all my pieces in order to win!
moves.32. Ne5: I played the knight as a wanted my bishop in the f3 square.
moves.33. Be3: i put it here in order to protect the rook after d5. Actually that move never happened.
moves.33... Nf6: He played his knight and made me change me plans.
moves.34... Ka6: I don't know if he played it good. i think it's a bad movement.
moves.35... Kb7: He played Kb7. Now i h
moves.36. Kxb4: He was forced away of his rook.So he lost it!!
moves.36... Ng4: He's lost i suppose...Nothing great to do!
moves.40. Bxc5+: I took the pawn and checked again!
moves.43. Ra5#: And fortunately CHECHMATE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Ι discomfitted his plans!!!! I'm happy and excited!!!!! WAIT for your comments and ratings!!!! I hope you liked it and enjoyed it as well!!!! BYe bye from me!!!!

gameName: An easy game that became really difficult!!!! I tried until the end though and won!!!! FASCINATING!
